languages.text: Статуя Теодоры возвышается над разбитой погребальной урной. Ее взгляд уверен и дерзок, словно она бросает вызов осмелившимся нарушить покой Вольного Торговца.
Theodora's statue towers over the broken urn. Her gaze is confident and bold, as if she is challenging those who have dared disturb the Rogue Trader's rest.
languages.original_text: Статуя Теодоры возвышается над разбитой погребальной урной. Ее взгляд уверен и дерзок, словно она бросает вызов осмелившимся нарушить покой Вольного Торговца.

languages.text: La statue de Théodora domine l'urne brisée de toute sa hauteur. Son regard confiant et audacieux semble mettre au défi quiconque ose troubler le repos de la libre-marchande.
languages.original_text: Theodora's statue towers over the broken urn. Her gaze is confident and bold, as if she is challenging those who have dared disturb the Rogue Trader's rest.

traits.locale_text: La statue de Théodora domine l'urne brisée de toute sa hauteur. Son regard confiant et audacieux semble mettre au défi quiconque ose troubler le repos de la libre-marchande.

languages.text: La estatua de Theodora se cierne sobre la urna rota. Su mirada confiada y osada parece desafiar a quienes se atrevan a perturbar el descanso de la Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: Theodora's statue towers over the broken urn. Her gaze is confident and bold, as if she is challenging those who have dared disturb the Rogue Trader's rest.

traits.locale_text: La estatua de Theodora se cierne sobre la urna rota. Su mirada confiada y osada parece desafiar a quienes se atrevan a perturbar el descanso de la Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: 西奥多拉的雕像耸立在破碎的骨灰盒之上。她的目光自信而豪迈，仿佛在挑战那些胆敢扰乱行商浪人长眠的人。
languages.original_text: Theodora's statue towers over the broken urn. Her gaze is confident and bold, as if she is challenging those who have dared disturb the Rogue Trader's rest.

traits.locale_text: 西奥多拉的雕像耸立在破碎的骨灰盒之上。她的目光自信而豪迈，仿佛在挑战那些胆敢扰乱行商浪人长眠的人。

languages.text: シオドーラの像が、割れた骨壷の上にそびえ立っている。彼女の視線は自信に満ち、大胆で、まるでローグトレーダーの安息を邪魔する者に挑んでいるかのようだ。
languages.original_text: Theodora's statue towers over the broken urn. Her gaze is confident and bold, as if she is challenging those who have dared disturb the Rogue Trader's rest.

traits.locale_text: シオドーラの像が、割れた骨壷の上にそびえ立っている。彼女の視線は自信に満ち、大胆で、まるでローグトレーダーの安息を邪魔する者に挑んでいるかのようだ。

languages.text: Theodoras Statue ragt über der zerstörten Urne auf. Ihr Blick ist selbstbewusst und kühn, als würde sie all jene herausfordern, die es gewagt haben, die Rast des Freihändlers zu stören.
languages.original_text: Theodora's statue towers over the broken urn. Her gaze is confident and bold, as if she is challenging those who have dared disturb the Rogue Trader's rest.

traits.locale_text: Theodoras Statue ragt über der zerstörten Urne auf. Ihr Blick ist selbstbewusst und kühn, als würde sie all jene herausfordern, die es gewagt haben, die Rast des Freihändlers zu stören.

languages.text: Kırılmış vazonun yanında Theodora'nın heykeli yükseliyor. Bakışları öz güven ve cesaret dolu. Hür Tacir'in, istirahatini bozmaya cüret edenlere meydan okuyor gibi bir edası var.
languages.original_text: Theodora's statue towers over the broken urn. Her gaze is confident and bold, as if she is challenging those who have dared disturb the Rogue Trader's rest.
